remarks: The completeness axiom for reals in terms of infimum: a nonempty, bounded-below set of reals has an infimum.  (This theorem is the dual of ~ sup3 .)  (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2005.)
statement:
infm3 $p |- ( ( A C_ RR /\ A =/= (/) /\ E. x e. RR A. y e. A x <_ y ) -> E. x e. RR ( A. y e. A -. y < x /\ A. y e. RR ( x < y -> E. z e. A z < y ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
